Html: Is it possible to configure the host in web.config so both www.mydomain.com and mydomain.com works?

In the most recent (pre-RC) release of Oxite, this works

       <site name="Duncan Mackenzie .NET" host="http://duncanmackenzie.net" id="4B0E80FB-BDCA-49F0-B680-AF18D38501D0" languageDefault="en" timeZoneOffset="-8" gravatarDefault="http%3A%2F%2Ffarm4.static.flickr.com%2F3161%2F3075626008_bafe9b2801.jpg%3Fv%3D0" themeDefault="Duncan">
        <aliases>
          <add host="http://www.duncanmackenzie.net" />
        </aliases>
      </site>
